OOC- Sorry, this is a long Email. Im trying to catch up. Also, I wanted 
everyones opnion. Where do you think the Beast Wars took place? Do you think 
it took place in America, Asia, Pangea? I think it took place in Africa 
because it has most of the terrian that the Predacons/Maximals used. But, 
Pangea is also a good bet because it was a super continent that probly had 
numerous different climates. 



::: HELL BEAST steped onto the floating island. Before his was the Maximal 
ship, armed and ready to fire upon them. BLACK ARACNIA, GREMLIN, and now 
PHENIOX and JACKLE, who were preoccupied elsewhere finally showed up. HELL 
BEAST looked to his left and his right, seeing the other Predacon there. For 
the last time he looked down to his wrist controller, it gave the status to 
the Predacon base, and complete control over its wepons and defences. ::::

::: BLACK ARACNIA ::: So...how should we start this thing?

::: GREMLIN ::: According to Rampage, the flyers go and then the ground 
assulters follow.

::: PHENIOX takes to the sky ::: All flyers, lets go!

:::: BLACK ARACNIA, GREMLIN, and JACKLE surge forward, fully pummeling the 
Maximal sheilds with there blaster pistols and missle launchers. HELL BEAST 
hung back with a bit of worry...but soon the feeling of battle took his 
senses and he took to the air, sending a spitfire of bullets from his twin 
chain guns to the hull, waiting for the first Maximal to leave the base. :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: TRANSANULAS sped onward, with Quickstrike still clinging to his back. 
They left Crow Lord to perish in the flaming forest. Now, they were deep into 
the vast smelly swamps of the valley. Swarming with bugs and covered in mist 
they would be safe for a time. :::

::: TRANSANULAS transforms and looks down to the tiny fuzor ::: Ah, 
Quickstrike. If memory serves me well, you were quite the little tropper. 

::: He looked around and spotted a large gatror rip apart a tiny deer that 
had somehow gotten into the swamp and decided to take a sip at the pool of 
mirky water. The confrontation was short, but bloody. ::::

::: TRANSANULAS ::: So, as I now see it were partners. What we need to do is 
to seek vengence upon our oppressors. Surely you want to get back at 
someone...HELL BEAST...MEGATRONE...RAMPAGE? 

::: He paused as a flock of birds flew above them :::

::: He continued ::: I want to get back at both HELL BEAST and MEGATRON for 
there manipulation of honest bots like you and myself. When we have completed 
out vengence....we can use our resources to get back to Cybertron...

::: He stoped and relished the idea of ruling the planet, a long time 
ambition of the arachnid. :::

::: The spider looked to the fuzor ::: So, what is your insight on all of 
this?

~~~~~~~~~~~

::: OMINOUS PRIME, the ever vigulat anachist of the Beast Wars looked at his 
scanners to see the battle taking place. Predacon verse Maximals this 
time....just like the old days. Hidden in his workshop stronghold, he was 
safe. He tinkered with somethings, but nothing serious. After the spider left 
his here to die at the hands of his enemys....he wanted to show him that 
OMINOUS PRIME was no fool. ::::

::: OMINOUS ::: Hm...HELL BEAST is at the battle, his base ungaurded. 
TRANSANULAS is abroad....unprotected. What to do, what to do?

::: He picked up his energon blaster, refuled his Liquid Energon core that 
powered him, and secured his base. He blasted out of the artic region to get 
back at his enemyies! :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: MEGATRON looked to Shredder ::: Agreed...we do need CR chambers. But the 
Predacons are departing to the battle. We can go to the allience members and 
offer them our speeder in return for the usage of the Chambers I suppose. Its 
our best bet.

::: RAT TRAP ::: The Predacon base is unprotected! we could just-

::: MEGATRON ::: We are in no condition to battle there defences, besides Im 
sure HELL BEAST had already placed a system to keep us out.

::: Looking around a last time he seised fire ::: Predacons lets go...and 
Antix, your welcome aboard, just as long as you can carry your own weight. 
Lets go, we need to talk with Zardus....
